name: BstCmsSubcategories6

infos.name: Unterkategorien Slider für Erlebniswelten
infos.description:
Unterkategorien Slider für Erlebniswelten

Die App erweitert die Erlebniswelten um ein neues Element zur Darstellung der Unterkategorie. Die Unterkategorien werden dabei in einem responsive Slider darstellt.

Wahlweise können neben den Kategorienamen auch die Kategorie-Bilder eingeblendet werden.


Sind Sie zufrieden mit unserer App und unserem Service? Dann bewerten Sie die App in Ihrem Shopware Account. Damit unterstützen Sie uns, auch in Zukunft weitere Apps zu entwickeln. Vielen Dank ;)
infos.installationManual:
• Schritt 1: Installation und Aktivierung der App über den App-Manager
  • Schritt 2: Erlebniswelt öffnen und unter der Block-Kategorie Commerce das Element "Unterkategorie Slider" auswählen
  • Schritt 3: Gegebenenfalls den Cache leeren und das Theme kompilieren

 

Template override

{% sw_extends '@Storefront/storefront/layout/navigation/bst-subcategories.html.twig' %}

{% block layout_subnavigation_categories %}
    {% set catSliderOptions = {
        slider: {
            nav: false,
            controls: true,
            gutter: 15,
            items: 2,
            slideBy: "page",
            mouseDrag: true,
            swipeAngle: false,
            speed: 400,
            loop: false,
            responsive: {
                sm: {
                    items: 3
                },
                lg: {
                    items: 4
                },
                xl: {
                    controls: true,
                    items: 5
                }
            }
        }
    } %}
    {{ parent() }}
{% endblock %}

{% block layout_subnavigation_slider_config %}{{ catSliderOptions|json_encode }}{% endblock %}

 

Styling

.cms-block-subcategory-navigation {
    overflow: visible; // an! important may be necessary here
}
infos.shortDescription: Die App erweitert die Erlebniswelten um ein neues Element zur Darstellung der Unterkategorie. Die Unterkategorien werden dabei in einem responsive Slider darstellt.
infos.highlights:
Platzsparende Darstellung als Slider
Einfache Bedienung
Darstellung der Kategorie-Bilder möglich

infos.name: Subcategory Slider for Shopping Experiences
infos.description:
Subcategory Slider for Shopping Experiences

The app expands the experience worlds with a new element to display the sub-category. The sub-categories are displayed in a responsive slider which allows display of multiple itemes. 
In addition to the category names, the category images can also be displayed.


Are you satisfied with our app and our service? Then rate the app in your Shopware account. With this you support us to develop further apps in the future. Many Thanks ;)
infos.installationManual:
• Step 1: Installation and activation of app through app manager
  • Step 2: Open the Shopping Experience and select the element "Subcategory Slider" under the Block Category Commerce
  • Step 3: May you have to clear your Cache and compile your Theme

 

Template override

{% sw_extends '@Storefront/storefront/layout/navigation/bst-subcategories.html.twig' %}

{% block layout_subnavigation_categories %}
    {% set catSliderOptions = {
        slider: {
            nav: false,
            controls: true,
            gutter: 15,
            items: 2,
            slideBy: "page",
            mouseDrag: true,
            swipeAngle: false,
            speed: 400,
            loop: false,
            responsive: {
                sm: {
                    items: 3
                },
                lg: {
                    items: 4
                },
                xl: {
                    controls: true,
                    items: 5
                }
            }
        }
    } %}
    {{ parent() }}
{% endblock %}

{% block layout_subnavigation_slider_config %}{{ catSliderOptions|json_encode }}{% endblock %}

 

Styling

.cms-block-subcategory-navigation {
    overflow: visible; // an! important may be necessary here
}
infos.shortDescription: The app expands the experience worlds with a new element to display the sub-category. The sub-categories are displayed in a responsive slider which allows display of multiple itemes
infos.highlights:
Space-saving presentation as a slider
Easy handling
Display of the category images possible

comments.text: Das Plugin macht genau was es soll. Schade kann man es auf der Startseite nicht einsetzen Typ Landing Page. Hier wäre der coole Workaround, wenn man einfach die oberste Kategorie angeben könnten und alle Unterkategorien werden dann ausgegeben.
comments.headline: Cooles Plugin

comments.text: Das Plugin funktioniert einwandfrei und das Entwicklerteam steht schnell und kompetent bei Rückfragen zur Verfügung.
comments.headline: Hervorragend. Tolles Plugin mit sehr gutem Support

changelog.text: Compatibility with Shopware 6.5 and Code Optimization
Extension configuration for displaying neighboring categories if there are no other child categories. Fix item width if option "Use auto width for Slides" is enabled
Extend configuration to use auto with for slides
Bugfix: Category images are only displayed on the first level.

Navigation arrows can now be controlled within the slider configuration for each resolution. Notice! The implementation of the slider configuration has been changed. If necessary, adjustments must be made.
Expansion of the configuration: Category images of the child categories can now optionally be displayed in the frontend.
Define the slider items for each resolution. Correction of child category determinatio
